dcterms:creator: Ankush Khandelwal
Sahil Swami
Syed S Akhtar
Manish Shrivastava
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3543 annotated tweets, with 1755 labeled as humorous and 1698 as non-humorous, used for humor detection in Hindi-English code-mixed data.
dcterms:title: Khandelwal et al. (2018) Humor Detection Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sushmitha Reddy Sane
Suraj Tripathi
Koushik Reddy Sane
Radhika Mamidi
dcterms:description: A corpus of around 200k tweets extracted for training bilingual word embeddings in Hindi-English code-mixed data.
dcterms:title: Twitter Corpus for Bilingual Word Embeddings
